mapper.select:
SELECT IFNULL(t.id,80000) as game_type, IFNULL(t.game_name,'蛮牛') game_name, COUNT(1) bet_count, SUM(d.bet_money) betamount, SUM(d.pay_off) winlose, SUM(d.validBetMoney) validamount FROM ds_manniu_bet d LEFT JOIN ds_game_type t ON d.game_type = t.out_game_code AND t.fk_live_id=22 and t.parent_id = 80
GROUP BY d.game_type

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(d.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') bet_time, count(1) bet_count, SUM(d.bet_money) betamount,SUM(d.pay_off) winlose, SUM(d.validBetMoney) validamount FROM ds_manniu_bet d
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(d.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')
select count(*) as bet_count,sum(bet_money) as betamount,sum(validBetMoney) as validamount,sum(pay_off) as winlose from ds_manniu_bet
